00040 
00041 #ifndef CONVERSIONUTILS_H
00042 #define CONVERSIONUTILS_H
00043 
00044 #include "Pose2D.h"
00045 #include "Twist2D.h"
00046 #include "kdl/frames.hpp"
00047 
00048 void pose2dToFrameKdl(const Pose2D& pose2d, KDL::Frame& pose) {
00049     pose = KDL::Frame(KDL::Rotation::RPY(0, 0, pose2d.getTheta()), KDL::Vector(pose2d.getX(), pose2d.getY(), 0));
00050 }
00051 
00052 void twist2dToTwistKdl(const Twist2D& twist2d, KDL::Twist& twist) {
00053     twist = KDL::Twist(KDL::Vector(twist2d.getX(), twist2d.getY(), 0), KDL::Vector(0, 0, twist2d.getTheta()));
00054 }
00055 
00056 
00057 #endif  /* CONVERSIONUTILS_H */
00058
